conversation_history.content:
Hello! I'm Deckster, your AI presentation assistant. I can help you create professional, engaging presentations on any topic.

What presentation would you like to build today?
I need a presentation about AI in healthcare, focusing on diagnostic applications and patient outcomes.

Great topic! To create the perfect presentation for you, I need to understand your needs better:
• Who is the target audience?
• What is the primary goal?
• How long should the presentation be?
• Any specific diagnostic applications or patient outcomes to emphasize?

The audience will be healthcare professionals at a medical conference. They have basic understanding of AI but want practical applications. The presentation should be about 20 minutes long. Focus on recent case studies and real-world implementations. Include both benefits and challenges.

Perfect! Based on your input, I'll create a 10-slide presentation.
• Focus on practical AI applications in diagnostics and patient outcomes
• Include real-world case studies from leading hospitals
• Address both advantages and implementation challenges
• Tailored for healthcare professionals with actionable insights

Does this structure work for you?
Yes, this looks good. Please proceed with creating the presentation.
